description: Shopee Open Platform is a go-to source of Open APIs and services for developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs.

platform_features.name: Powerful APIs
platform_features.description: Access to wide range of Open APIs for orders, products, marketing and push notification services

platform_features.name: Comprehensive developer services
platform_features.description: End-to-end developer support for onboarding, APP development, testing, release, and maintenance

platform_features.name: Management Tools
platform_features.description: Manage APPs, access testing tools, test accounts and sandbox environments

user_types.description: Access to comprehensive range of Open APIs for Shopee's ecommerce processes
Can develop software tailored to business needs and integrate systems with Shopee

notes: This appears to be an introduction/overview page of the Shopee Open Platform documentation rather than a specific API endpoint documentation. It contains general information about the platform, its features, and who can access it. The left sidebar shows the full documentation structure including sections for API calls, Authentication, and various integration guides.
